name: DarkChromePastelFluoWebTheme
description:
For all sites(except GAFAM), description:
https://github.com/acccounttest/DarkChromePastelFluoWebTheme

Initially can use domain regex blacklister only in Firefox not in Chrome.
So best is use an extension that permit to switch on/off others extension by a shortcut, really faster than go to the icon and choose the off just near the delete button...
Made for Stylish.

Not exhaustive bug list:
-Google search input is displaced
-Videos need a right clic or disable
-GAFAM can be partially broken
-Menus can show all visible at same time just like cache in Google search
